dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] blueportal.org = warez site hosted @ 70.86.191.82 (TP)]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, November 20, 2005 6:05 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; christech@gmail.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] blueportal.org = warez site hosted @ 70.86.191.82
(TP)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] blueportal.org = warez site hosted @ 70.86.191.82 (TP)
Date: Sun, 20 Nov 2005 10:15:32 -0600
From: Chris Tech <christech@gmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

http://blueportal.org/
Hosting on IP
70.86.191.82 <http://70.86.191.82>

NetRange:   70.84.0.0 <http://70.84.0.0> - 70.87.127.255
<http://70.87.127.255>
CIDR:       70.84.0.0/15 <http://70.84.0.0/15>, 70.86.0.0/16
<http://70.86.0.0/16>, 70.87.0.0/17 <http://70.87.0.0/17>
NetName:    NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13


Is hosting/linking/posting illegal software/books/ect.

From your own page
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html

*Compliance with Law*

Customer shall not post, transmit, re-transmit or store material on or
through any of Services or Products which, in the sole judgment of the
Company (i) is in violation of any local, state, federal or non-United
States law or regulation, (ii) threatening, obscene, indecent, defamatory or
that otherwise could adversely affect any individual, group or entity
(collectively, "Persons") or (iii) violates the rights of any person,
including rights protected by copyright, trade secret, patent or other
intellectual property or similar laws or regulations including, but not
limited to, the installation or distribution of "pirated" or other software
products that are not appropriately licensed for use by Customer. Customer
shall be responsible for determining what laws or regulations are applicable
to its use of the Services and Products.

This site is breaking your own terms of service / aup. I really wish you
would clean up this problem. I don't care to be hosted on the same network
as a bunch of warez kiddies.


Chris


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
